name: Harshita Kasera
body:
### Hey there!
I am a passionate Software developer and expert in HTML, CSS, Javascript and Nodejs. In my 3 years of work experience in one of India's leading startups, I have worked on multiple projects where I have used a multitude of web technologies to solve challenging technical problems. I have recently started working on JAVA and I am really looking forward to explore it further. I enjoy data structures and solve algorithmic problems when I am free.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
